page.title: 11SHERIFF HUTTON TRADESPEOPLE
page.content: The Post Office with Data Post and Vehicle licensing is also a general store organising evening paper deliveries.Second general store has an off-license,video club and cobblers collecting point.One butcher.Three garages.Two for petrol and repairs.One specalises in body repairs.One also offers bottled gas sales and service, car and bicycle extras and some farm supplies.One Hairdresser.Importer of Scandinavian wooden gifts plus shop. Daily delivery;milkman offering dairy produce,newspapers,dry cleaning and laundry.Weekly delivery;baker,butcher, fishmonger,fish & chips,coalman, videos.Less frequent;Ringtons tea, Kleeneasy.Other village trades;Two builders,2 plumbers,joiner & under- taker,painter,roof repair specialist, insurance broker,Two JCB's+Drivers,one man haulage business.2B&B,guesthouse.
